name: Robey's Blue Crab Deviled Eggs
author: CYNDISINGER
summary: Any Robey Family special occasion is marked by the MUST have blue devils, including all weddings, Easter, Xmas & Summer feasts. Were from Va. so it's a custom by the Bay!!!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon Old Bay Seasoning TM
directions: Place eggs in a saucepan with enough water to cover
Bring water to a boil and remove saucepan from heat
Let eggs stand in hot water for 15 minutes
Cut the eggs in half lengthwise and remove the yolks
In a bowl, mash the yolks and mix with mayonnaise, paprika, mustard powder, and   seasoning
Spoon the mixture evenly into the hollowed egg white halves
Chill at least 1 hour before serving
